meanings.definition: A nobleman ranking below a count and above a baron.
meanings.sent1: The vicomtes attended the royal ball in their finest attire.
meanings.sent2: The vicomtes inherited their titles from their ancestors.
meanings.sent3: The vicomtes challenged each other to a friendly horse race.
meanings.sent4: The vicomtes stood out in the crowd like shining stars.
meanings.sent5: The vicomtes' elegant manners reflected their noble status.

meanings.definition: The title or position of a vicomte.
meanings.sent1: She admired the vicomtes' coats of arms displayed in the grand hall.
meanings.sent2: The vicomtes' lands were vast and rich in resources.
meanings.sent3: The vicomtes' titles sparked envy among the other nobles.
meanings.sent4: The vicomtes' influence extended far beyond their own estates.
meanings.sent5: The vicomtes' presence commanded respect and admiration.
